name: Caged (Out There Games)
description:
FLASHING LIGHTS AND LOUD, ABRUPT NOISES WARNING

This program is more than a game, It was made as a special type of prison, known as a cage. Within this program lies an AI known as Rucket. He has been locked in the cage for as long as he can remember. There is only one way he can escape...

With the help of YOU!

Take the role of YOURSELF and help free Rucket from his cage by solving puzzles using THE GAME FILES.

Thank you to Red Tree for the music! Flying Chair in Red Tree Orchestral Work (soundcloud.com)

Inspired Heavily by OneShot
